pageContext.claim: “I'll do it right now officially, is ask the Democrats to give us help on asylum, help on all of the loopholes -- the horrible loopholes that signed in over a period of years that don't allow us to do what we should be able to do. ...Our laws are so bad with catch-and-release and all of the different things including chain migration, the visa lottery -- the laws are so bad and the asylum rules and laws are so bad that our Border Patrol people, who are so incredible, aren't allowed to do their jobs.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims it would be easy to quickly make a deal -- 45 minutes, or even as little as 15 minutes. But there is relatively little support in Congress for many of his anti-immigration proposals. When the Senate voted in 2018 on different options, Trump's plan received the fewest number of votes, including many Republican "nay" votes.
